Name: Dark'n'Stormy shot
Instructions: POUR the first 3 ingredients into the glass in the following order. Then carefully FLOAT rum on the surface of the drink.
Review: Tastes just like a bite-sized Dark 'n' Stormy and as 'shots' go is bothtasty and relatively restrained on its alcoholic punch.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Simon Fraser and Andrew Holmes at Rumbar, Hamilton, Bermuda - home of the Dark 'n' Stormy.
Nutrition: One serving of Dark'n'Stormy shot contains 72 calories
